channel.title: Just need a small bit of help
channel.description:
Hi i was wondering if you could tell me how to make a pk zone so you dont lose all your stuff?
Please help

item.title: Just need a small bit of help
item.dc:creator: @Jackwebb Jackwebb
item.description:
@Jackwebb wrote:

How do i put that in a set of cords like

Sw X: 3205 Y: 3520
Nw X: 3224 Y: 3571
Se X: 3300 Y: 3520
Ne X: 3292 Y: 3565

And how do i make that area a PvP

Read full topic
item.source: Just need a small bit of help

item.title: Just need a small bit of help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Where you die, just make it look something like this;

if (playerLevel[3] < 1) { if (isInBlah()) { Teleport(2222, 2222, 0); playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = NewHP; setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, NewHP, playerXP[playerHitpoints]); NewHP = playerLevel[3]; sendMessage("Oh dear, you have died!"); } else { ApplyDead(); } playerLevel[3] = 0; }

Read full topic
item.source: Just need a small bit of help
